flow.name: db:/ingest

db:select.db:parameterized-query: SELECT sips.*, count(*) OVER() AS full_count FROM sips sips WHERE sips.organisation_id = #[flowVars.organisation_id] ORDER BY sips.last_event_date DESC OFFSET #[flowVars.startIndex] LIMIT #[flowVars.nrOfResults];

flow.name: db:/ingest/{id}

db:select.db:parameterized-query: SELECT * FROM events WHERE (local_id = #[flowVars.id] OR local_id IN(SELECT local_id FROM events WHERE pid = #[flowVars.id])) AND organisation_id = #[flowVars.organisation_id] ORDER BY date DESC;
